headline: Finance blogs
text: Brian M Lucey  a blog from a finance professor musing about issues in international business, finance and social science. If you run a finance blog and would like it to be featured on the higher education blog network, get in touch via email or Twitter using the hashtag #HEblognetwork This content is brought to you by Guardian Professional. To get more articles like this direct to your inbox, become a member of the Higher Education Network.
